_header: Seven Sleepers were holy men as me hath I-told before
_description: Legend of the Seven Sleepers in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
Seue sleparis were holi men as me haþ itold biuoreIn þe
                    site of ephese hi were alle ibore…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou god þat In þulke holi men so vair miracle sende
                    Bringe ous to þulke Ioie þat hor soule to wende

Bod779.First Lines:
Þe seue sleperis were holy men as men haþ ȝou I told be
                    foreIn þe cyte of ephese hy weren alle I bore…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& bring vs to þe ioye þat neuer ne chal
                    mysse& oure soule þer to reste In heuen ryche blisse

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEue slepers were seli Men as me haþ ou i told bi foreIn
                    þe Cite of Effese heo weoren alle i bore…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…God þat in þulke Men so feir Miracle sendeBring vs
                    to þat Ioye þat heore soules to wende. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seue Sleperes were holy men as me haþ ytold byfforeIn þe
                    cite of Ephese hi were alle of hare moder ybore…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now god þat in þulke holy men so ffayr miracle
                    sendeBringe vs to þulke ioye þat hare soules to wende

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEue sleperes were holy men as me haþ told by foreIn þe
                    cite of essese hii weren alle ybore…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…god þat in þulke holy men so fayre miracle
                    sendebrynge ous to þat hey Ioie þat here saule to
                    wende

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEue sleperis were holimen as me haþ ȝou itold biforeIn þe cite of ephese hi were alle ibore…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou god þat in þulke holimen so fair miracle sentebring ous to þilke heie ioie þat hor soule to wente
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum liiii” added to left margin by later hand (f. 120v).
BLCottJulDIX.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Cotton_MS_Julius_D_IX.

BLCottTitAXXVI.First Lines:
The sevyne slepparis were holy menAs ye haue herde of Be fforne
                    …
BLCottTitAXXVI.Last Lines:
…Nowe gode thorow þis holy men that soo ffayre myraclye
                    sendebrynge vus to the Ioye that neuer schall haue Ende
BLCottTitAXXVI.Editions:
Huber,  Michael. 
             Die Wanderlegende von den Siebenschläfern.
         Leipzig: O. Harrassowitz, 1910: 165.

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seuen slepares were seli men as me haþ ȝow told biforeIn þe cite of ephese hi weren alle ibore…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Now god þat in þo men so vair miracle sendeBring vs to þe holi ioie þat here soule to wende

BLEge2891.First Lines: Seue slepares were holymen as me haþ itold ȝou byuoreIn þe cite of Ephese ho were alle ybore…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …Nou god þat in þulke holymen so vair miracle sendeBryng us to þulke heie Ioie þat hore soule to wende
